constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 130 (Monday, July 26, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. DeFAZIO:
H.R. 4679.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 1, Clause 3, and Clause 18 of
the Constitution.
[Page H3908]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

title: To designate the Federal building located at 1200 New Jersey Avenue Southeast in Washington, DC, as the "Norman Yoshio Mineta Federal Building".
